{"step_by_step_thinking": "Impression compound is a thermoplastic material used in dentistry for making impressions of oral structures. According to Document [0], impression compound is classified as a reversible and rigid material. Document [1] explains that impression compound is a mucocompressive material, meaning that it impresses the mucosa when subjected to compression. Document [4] further describes it as a thermoplastic, rigid and reversible impression material.
